basics.name: Oualid Zari
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer / Data Scientist
basics.summary: Young PhD graduate seeking a position as a Machine Learning Engineer or Data Scientist to leverage expertise in AI and privacy-preserving techniques. Aiming to contribute to innovative projects and solve complex problems using advanced machine learning models and techniques.

work.name: Eurecom
work.summary: Led research and development of privacy-preserving machine learning solutions, focusing on differential privacy techniques applicable to real-world data scenarios.
highlights: Conducted comprehensive privacy audits on machine learning algorithms, identifying vulnerabilities and proposing mitigation strategies.

Developed novel privacy attacks against advanced ML models, including federated learning systems and graph neural networks, enhancing understanding of potential security risks in industry deployments.
Published and presented research findings at top-tier conferences, contributing to the field of privacy-preserving AI.
Investigated the impact of Large Language Models (LLMs) on graph structure privacy, identifying potential vulnerabilities in enterprise knowledge graph applications.

work.name: Inria Laboratory
work.summary: Developed a novel membership inference attack in federated learning, achieving state-of-the-art results with reduced computational resources.
highlights: Published findings in NeurIPS 2021 Workshop on Privacy in Machine Learning (PRIML).

courses: Privacy attacks and defenses for machine learning
